subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: Geno Auriemma became the second coach to achieve 100 victories in the N.C. A. A. tournament as Connecticut pulled off a record rout of Texas, 105-54, on Saturday
snippet: Geno Auriemma became the second coach to achieve 100 victories in the N.C. A. A. tournament as Connecticut pulled off a record rout of Texas, 105-54, on Saturday
